title: so i just vs'd a legit scripter, what do i do, cause riot doesn't give a shit
body:
i will name this player too i care if its total douchery too, this players name is [REMOVED - [Reporting Other Players](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

i was vsing him as lux and me tristana, he was literally scripting his to go where ever i was like using aimbot, i was in lane first yet he goes to lvl 2 first, i had twice the minion kills yet he always levels twice as fast, he literally does nothing and gains twice the xp and gold that i do, he never pushed the minions once and at one point my turret had 10% health, i pushed his turret like 5 times, and i could barely get it to half health, im adc i push 5 times, but enemy minions on there own damage my turret to 10% health are 2 times are you fuking kidding riot, this game was absolute bull shitt, i guarantee this guy is a cheater, dont play with

replies.body: are you sure they were scripting? do you have replays of the ‘scripter?’
